reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect summer set
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect 2 piece summer set. I have 43” bust and 33” waist, and the size large fits me perfectly. This is a very good transitional option while trying to lose weight. I didn’t want to invest on an expensive set when I’m probably going to wear this two or three times. The stitching is done nicely and it’s nice that the waistcoat is lined. I did not see any loose buttons and the structure seems to be well balanced. I’m hoping this set won’t be sticking to the skin under hot humid weather. I’m thinking about purchasing another set in different color. My only wish is that the waistcoat is a bit shorter in order to elongate the bottom portion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lindo acabado. color hermoso . tela fresca para verano . un poquito flojo el chaleco pero nada que no tenga solucion con un broche

reviews.reviewerName: Glamorous Gem Review HavenGlamorous Gem Review Haven
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Cute, Versatile, and True To Size
reviews.reviewText: Hi, it’s Glamorous Gem, hope you all are having a wonderful day,Anyway, I don’t have too many outfits like this and it seemed highly interesting. So, why not?This set is fairly simple and seems quite like Spring/Summer Attire. It has a no sleeve vest with a v-neck(that isn’t too revealing) and comes with shorts with an elastic banding.This outfit made out of 51%Polyester,46%Viscose,3%Elastane. It has a suit like feeling material on the outside and soft fabric on the inside. Not only is the fabric look appealing, it seems quite strong, durable, and it’s stretchy. So, that comes in handy for those that need a bit of extra room.As for size, it fit me perfectly. I did check in a previous post about it being “small”, but I’m glad I listened to my own mind. Be sure to order your true sizing, it is very accurate. Not only does it fit me well, but it seems to be roomy/slim fitting as well. It’s not too tight or too loose. I instantly loved the style on me. I’m about 5’0, 210, and have around a 34-36 waist. So, a 1X was just fine.So, this can be a day to day outfit, or be suitable for casual endeavors as well. Either or, it’s gender neutral, accommodating, versatile, dynamic, great for upcoming warm weather, and has a very attractive styling. I absolutely love it. 5/5PS: No matter the nature, I only write honest, unbiased, and authentic reviews. Thanks for reading☺️📖

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Cute Matching Short Set
reviews.reviewText: PRETTYGARDEN outfits rarely let me down. This short set is a nice quality. The vest is lined and is fitted in the bust area. I am a full 34b and had trouble buttoning the top button in the size Small. If you have a larger bust, I would size up. The shorts fit perfectly! Good length and two side pockets give a tailored, put together look. I like that you can mix and match the top and bottoms giving you multiple uses. I would purchase in other colors. I recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool and Comfortable plus some Annie Hall Vibes
reviews.reviewText: This is such an easy breezy outfit - like another reviewer, I’m honestly surprised at how much I love this. It’s so comfortable and the fact both pieces are lined has a lot to do with that. The fiber content of the lining feels so smooth, silky and cool on my skin. It also allows the fabric to drape as nicely as it does. I’m 5’5,” 165lbs, 38C, 34” waist, 44” hips and I ordered this in XL. It runs a bit big, but I wanted a loose fit. I especially did not want the waist to be too snug, which it isn’t. The armholes dip low, so I need to be mindful of what type of bra, or mostly likely bralette, I wear underneath.I’m really looking forward to sporting these pieces individually. I think the vest will look awesome with white linen slacks, a strappy cami and pointed flats or mules. Or some barrel jeans, a concert tee will be nice. In addition, I have a hack for the vest on days I want a more fitted look. I can take a brooch to gather some of the fabric, in the back, by my waistline. I like everything about this outfit, from the buttons to the roomy pockets of the shorts. I ordered this in the apricot shade, and the buttons coordinate so nicely. I do recommend going by the size guide as it’s fairly accurate. And I definitely recommend this versatile outfit. This brand, PrettyGarden, also has an Amazon store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Cute 2 Piece Set
reviews.reviewText: This two piece set is super cute and I feel can be pretty versatile depending on the look you’re going for. I ordered a large and it’s true to size; it’s a little baggier on me than I would have liked BUT that’s because I’ve lost about 7lbs since I ordered it originally so the fit is most likely due to that and not the product. The shorts are high waisted and sit comfortably above my belly button while still letting the shorts hit mid to low thigh, making them a professional length if someone were to wear them to an office or work function. The top fits nicely and I don’t feel the next to have to wear a shirt or cami under it to feel comfortable or covered so that’s nice. I love the green color and it matches the product description photos. Can pair with flats, heels or wedges to take the look from office to brunch to date night out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Honestly this surprised me - I adore this style
reviews.reviewText: This is one of those outfits that I was hesitant to grab but that surprised me with how comfortable, adorable and cute the style is. You can wear a bra or bralette under the vest top, or just whatever you’re comfy with. The sizing is true to size but I’m smaller up top so I have a little wiggle room and that actually is really nice and makes it more comfortable. The inside vest lining is SOFT and feels amazing. It looks like a really modern hip style outfit and is so versatile, so comfortable and really feels effortless to pair and make a nice presentable outfit that’s easy to throw on. Also, it can be upstyled so many ways and can be so simply paired together - I love how many options and ways there are to wear it. It’s absolutely a staple and I adore it!!!
Great two piece set. True to size
It’s very nice and light however size fit smaller I’m going to return and see if they have a larger size
